boardgame.name: Micro Mutants: Evolution
boardgame.description: This is an updated version of X-Bugs, by the same designers, released by Nexus and distibuted by Fantasy Flight Games in the USA. Redesigned from the ground up, the core game mechanic remains the same, but all armies have been tweaked and modified along a structure that makes use of cards describing abilities and upgrades, cardboard bases and resources, measuring rulers for some special abilities, and large cardboard tiles representing special terrain. The game now also includes a playmat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is based on the classic Tiddlywinks. The set includes four armies, each with three bases and a distinct assortment of bugs. The bugs are plastic winks in three different shapes and sizes. Two six-sided dice determine which bugs you may move on a turn. Enemy bugs and bases are defeated by landing your bugs on top of them. All bugs also feature special abilities, such as allowing multiple moves or firing projectile winks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Fantasy Flight Games (FFG MM01) Micro Mutants: Evolution is the first Micro Mutants game. It includes everything up to four players need to do microscopic battle, including the Usarthopod, Flyborg, Sovietopter, and Chitinian armies! For 2-4 players, playable in 30 to 60 minutes. Micro Mutants: Evolution includes: 4 complete bug armies, each including: 5 breeds of bug 2 action dice 1 shooter Breed, projectile, and evolution cards Deadly and dangerous projectiles 5 base tokens 1 playmat 3 terrain features Resource tokens, meteor tokens, warp gate tokens, and other odds and ends!
Opened and played twice. Pieces are in near-perfect condition.

Fantasy Flight Games - Micro Mutants: Evolution Language: English Players: 2 to 4 Age: 10+ Duration: about 30 min Weight: 0.980 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: This is an updated version of X-Bugs, by the same designers, released by Nexus and distibuted by Fantasy Flight Games in the USA. Redesigned from the ground up, the core game mechanic remains the same, but all armies have been tweaked and modified along a structure that makes use of cards describing abilities and upgrades, cardboard bases and resources, measuring rulers for some special abilities, and large cardboard tiles representing special terrain. The game now also includes a playmat. The game is based on the classic Tiddlywinks. The set includes four armies, each with three bases and a distinct assortment of bugs. The bugs are plastic winks in three different shapes and sizes. Two six-sided dice determine which bugs you may move on a turn. Enemy bugs and bases are defeated by landing your bugs on top of them. All bugs also feature special abilities, such as allowing multiple moves or firing projectile winks. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
Missing one rectangular flipping piece (grey) - not essential for play as players can share. All other components in excellent condition.
In shrink. Non smoking home.
